meanings.definition: Having or producing a lot of smog
meanings.sent1: The city experienced its smoggiest day ever, making it hard to see buildings.
meanings.sent2: Today is the smoggiest day of the year, with pollution levels at an all-time high.
meanings.sent3: The smoggiest sky I've ever seen made me feel like I was in a foggy dream.
meanings.sent4: The smoggiest atmosphere enveloped the city like a thick, gray blanket.
meanings.sent5: The smoggiest air imaginable filled my lungs, making it difficult to breathe.

meanings.sent1: This is the smoggiest area in the entire city, with pollution levels off the charts.
meanings.sent2: The smoggiest part of town always makes my eyes water from the pollution.
meanings.sent3: The smoggiest street in the neighborhood is nicknamed 'Foggy Lane' by locals.
meanings.sent4: The smoggiest corner of the city seemed to swallow up all the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The smoggiest day of the year cast a gloomy shadow over the entire town.
